posts.postText:
Just wanna know, Which admin menu, was infact more superior?

Or did you like it when there were two?
I liked both, but just ULX tops it all!

Evo seems more... idk what word is but better. However I never remember not being able to unban wrongly banned people when we had ulx. Negligible inconvenience but side note, undoing toggleable punishments are kinda weird with new one.

>>  Vanilla Crazy Cake":2enpw4hj]

Evolve has a few more, FUN commands, But ulx has and had the most usefull.

Evolve has a lot of glitches with commands (can't unmute people with chat, cant unban period)

ulx has little to none
Yeah my #1 problem with evo is the fact that we can't unban people, that is a pretty big problem The rest is good or so minor it doesn't matter.
